column6: - In a world without Captain America, the United States has lost its spirit, its inspiration. - A secret cabal unites to create a new Captain America in the nation's most trying time. - The war veteran Frank Castle is transformed into something far more than he ever imagined - but not everyone is Steve Rogers...
column8: | writer:Joseph Keatinge | artist:Piotr Kowalski | penciller (cover):Chris Stevens
